Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of refugee claim decision
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Board committed a reviewable error in its credibility assessment
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Adverse credibility findings due to inconsistencies and implausibility
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Oral testimony, documentary evidence, prior claims
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistencies in applicant's narrative and implausible events
Crimes.Application_Error: Alleged perversity or capriciousness in factual findings
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Applicant alleged but court found no such omission
Crimes.Application_Factor: Subjective and objective fear of persecution
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: Section 75 of IRPA regarding standard of review
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of credible basis for fear of persecution
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistencies in testimony and lack of corroboration
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Board provided adequate reasons and considered evidence
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Implausibility of claimed threats and lack of action on prior claims
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of Boardâ€™s decision
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to act on previous refugee claims abroad

Crimes.Crime_Name: Use of false documents for international travel
Crimes.Dispute_Type: Judicial review of refugee claim decision
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Board made patently unreasonable credibility findings
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Refugee protection claim involving document fraud
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Doubted due to inconsistencies and implausible claims
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Travel documents, testimony, history of claims
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Fear of persecution and use of fraudulent travel documents
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Use of false documents and lack of credible explanation
Crimes.Application_Error: Alleged failure to consider key testimony
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Claimed by applicant, rejected by court
Crimes.Application_Factor: Credibility undermined by use of false documents
Crimes.Authority: Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Credibility concerns linked to document fraud
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to explain use of false documents, inconsistent accounts
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Board provided reasoned decision based on record
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Use of false documents for international travel
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Implausible explanations and lack of corroborating evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Allegation of unfair assessment of evidence
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to clarify origin and use of travel documents
